title: Henry Ford's America
creator_contributor_role: National Film Board of Canada, production company

description: An inside look at the workings of the Ford Motor Company. Traces the history of the company using historical footage, and interviews with Henry Ford II and other company executives. Looks at the developing role of the car within American society. Script, Donald Brittain. Editing, Rosemarie Shapely and Les Halman. Images, Andreas Poulsson. Music, Art Phillips.
